Hero.Title: Artificial intelligence consulting
Hero.Description: Transform your business with AI solutions tailored to your needs. We support you in integrating artificial intelligence to automate your processes, improve your decisions and create value.

Presentation.Intro: Artificial intelligence is no longer reserved for large corporations. Today, SMEs can leverage these technologies to gain efficiency, reduce costs and deliver better customer experiences. Our pragmatic approach allows you to adopt AI progressively, without disrupting your organization.

Why.Title: Why invest in AI now
Why.Text: Artificial intelligence technologies have reached a level of maturity that makes them accessible and profitable for businesses of all sizes. Whether automating repetitive tasks, analyzing large amounts of data, or improving your customer service, AI offers concrete transformation opportunities. We regularly see that companies adopting these tools gain productivity while freeing their teams for higher value missions.

Automation.Title: Intelligent automation
Automation.Text: We identify repetitive processes in your business and design AI-based automation solutions. This can include automatic document processing, data classification, or customer request management. The goal is to reduce time spent on routine tasks and minimize human errors.

Analytics.Title: Predictive analytics
Analytics.Text: Your data contains valuable information about your customers, operations and growth opportunities. We implement predictive analytics models that help you anticipate trends, optimize inventory or personalize your offerings. These tools transform your data into tangible competitive advantages.

Chatbots.Title: Conversational assistants
Chatbots.Text: Chatbots and virtual assistants improve your customer service while reducing your team workload. We develop solutions that understand natural language and can handle a wide range of requests, from technical support to sales inquiries. These assistants work around the clock and continuously improve through machine learning.

Custom.Title: Custom solutions
Custom.Text: Every business has specific needs. We design custom AI applications that integrate perfectly into your existing environment. Whether image recognition, natural language processing or complex process optimization, we develop the solution that precisely addresses your challenges.

Approach.Title: Our working method
Approach.Text: We always start by understanding your current processes and identifying improvement opportunities. Then we develop a pilot project that quickly demonstrates the value of AI in your context. This progressive approach allows you to see the benefits before extending the solution across your organization. We stay by your side to train your teams and ensure implementation success.

Technologies.Title: Technologies and tools
Technologies.Text: We work with the most powerful AI platforms on the market, including OpenAI, Microsoft Azure AI, and other specialized solutions according to your needs. Our expertise covers machine learning, natural language processing, computer vision and data analysis. We always select the technologies best suited to your situation, prioritizing reliability and ease of maintenance.

AzureAI.Title: Azure AI: infrastructure and data sovereignty
AzureAI.Intro: Our expertise is built on Microsoft Azure AI, a comprehensive platform that combines technical power with confidentiality guarantees essential for Swiss businesses.

Models.Title: Private AI model deployment
Models.Text: We deploy state-of-the-art artificial intelligence models (GPT-4, GPT-4o, Llama 3, Mistral) in your own Azure environment. This approach ensures your data remains under your complete control and is never used to train third-party models. You choose the deployment region, ideally Switzerland North or West Europe to meet Swiss data localization requirements. Unlike public SaaS solutions, you control model versions, moderation policies, and update cycles.

Indexing.Title: Document indexing and semantic search
Indexing.Text: Azure AI Search indexes all your company documents, whether in SharePoint, OneDrive, databases or business systems. Semantic search understands the intent behind a query rather than simply matching words. Your employees instantly find relevant information even if phrased differently. Documents are automatically enriched with AI-extracted metadata, facilitating classification and regulatory compliance.

Agents.Title: Autonomous AI agents and orchestration
Agents.Text: We develop AI agents capable of autonomously executing complex tasks using Azure AI Agent Service and Microsoft Semantic Kernel. These agents can call your internal APIs, query your databases, generate reports, or trigger workflows as needed. Multi-agent orchestration breaks down complex processes into specialized tasks, each agent bringing its specific expertise. This modular architecture facilitates maintenance and evolution of your AI solutions.

Grounding.Title: Grounding with Bing and your data
Grounding.Text: Grounding anchors AI responses in reliable data sources. We connect your models to your internal knowledge bases via the RAG pattern (Retrieval Augmented Generation), ensuring responses are based on your official documents. For needs requiring current external information, integration with Bing Search enriches answers with recent public data while citing sources. This hybrid approach combines your company's internal expertise with up-to-date general knowledge.

UseCases.Title: Real-world use cases
UseCases.Intro: Discover how we helped Geneva businesses transform their operations with artificial intelligence. These real projects demonstrate the measurable benefits of AI applied to concrete business challenges.

Cases.Title: Mail and email automation
Cases.Summary: A Geneva law firm reduced incoming mail and email processing time by 83% thanks to an AI system automatically classifying each document and message by nature. The system extracts key information, routes to the right files, and alerts on urgencies. Lawyers instantly find any communication through semantic search.

Cases.Title: Automatic deadline detection
Cases.Summary: A notary office never misses any deadline thanks to a SharePoint application automatically analyzing documents to identify all legal and contractual deadlines. The system creates calendar events in Teams with progressive alerts, completely eliminating the risk of oversight that could have serious consequences on professional liability.

Cases.Title: Intelligent invoice payment reminders
Cases.Summary: A financial consulting firm reduced its average payment time by 40% through automated and personalized reminders generated by AI. The system adapts tone and content based on delay duration and relationship history, generating courteous and effective emails. Time spent on reminders dropped by 85%.

Cases.Title: Automatic legal document summarization
Cases.Summary: A wealth management company now processes 10 times more reports and contracts thanks to AI document synthesis. The system generates two levels of structured summaries allowing managers to quickly decide if in-depth reading is necessary. Time spent on document review decreased by 70%.

Cases.Title: Contract drafting assistant
Cases.Summary: An international trading company divided its commercial contract drafting time by three thanks to an AI-powered Word add-in. The assistant automatically selects appropriate clauses from a validated base, generates the personalized contract, and checks consistency. Legal professionals now focus on customization and negotiation rather than mechanical drafting.

Cases.Title: Predictive sales and inventory analysis
Cases.Summary: A pharmaceutical distributor reduced stockouts by 70% and expiry losses by 65% through AI predictive models analyzing five years of history enriched with contextual data. Predictions accurately anticipate seasonal peaks and optimize orders, freeing 120,000 CHF in working capital.

Cases.Title: Knowledge base with semantic search
Cases.Summary: A software publisher reduced support ticket resolution times by 55% through an AI-augmented knowledge base. Semantic search understands the intent behind questions, and a GPT-4 model generates synthetic answers citing sources. New technicians become operational twice as fast.

Cases.Title: Meeting transcription and action extraction
Cases.Summary: An audit firm eliminated manual note-taking and saves 12 hours per week through AI transcription of client meetings. The system automatically generates structured minutes, creates Planner tasks for each agreed action, and detects client sentiment. Minutes are sent within the hour following the meeting.

Items.Desc: Automate repetitive tasks and allow your teams to focus on high-value activities.

Items.Title: Cost reduction
Items.Desc: Lower your operational costs by optimizing your processes and reducing manual errors.

Items.Title: Better decision making
Items.Desc: Base your decisions on in-depth data analysis rather than intuition alone.

Items.Title: Competitive advantage
Items.Desc: Adopt the technologies that will make the difference against your competitors in the years to come.
